title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has the highest Percentage score and Toyota has the lowest Percentage score.
The difference of Percentage score between the highest and lowest Automobile Manufacturers is 5.42.
